page.title: 05The Post Office
page.content: In the centre of{Blackmore}are premises built in 1888 specifically as a{post office}.Out side there is a post box and telephone box while inside in one corner there is the postal department.The rest of the{shop is given over to the sale of cards , sweets and haberdashery{.Employment}is provided for 5 people from the village .Two work in the{post office}and 3 deliver{letters.}The parcels and letters are brought to Blackmore from Ingatestone and collections are taken back there twice on weekdays and once on Saturdays.{Business}carried out includes vouchers , T.V.,vehicle and dog licences,saving certificates and banking facilities and all postal services.The{social aspect}of a village post office is of great importance especially to the elderly.
